response.overview: After the release of the epidemic, Tianshi returned to his hometown to join the genealogy. The process was very simple and smooth, but soon his grandfather got a COVID and died. Tianshi suspected that this might be his own fault, but he did not dare to talk to others about it. He could only try to help deal with the funeral more decently. The funeral was done in a messy and unsightly manner, and my grandfather passed away hastily like this. As he was leaving, Tian Shi wanted to say something alone to his cousin at the station. He hesitated, but first heard his cousin's blessing for him to leave his hometown ..
response.title: Burn after Writing
